remarks: A version of ~ iblsplit using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions" (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
iblsplitf.X $e |- F/ x ph $.
iblsplitf.vol $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` ( A i^i B ) ) = 0 ) $.
iblsplitf.u $e |- ( ph -> U = ( A u. B ) ) $.
iblsplitf.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. U ) -> C e. CC ) $.
iblsplitf.a $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. A |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblsplitf.b $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. B |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
iblsplitf $p |- ( ph -> ( x e. U |-> C ) e. L^1 ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d U x $.
